comments_since_last_sample.body: It's your problem you can't get one.
Socialists are weak, whiny losers. That's why they hate the rich and strong men.
Why would you expect anyone to intervene? They could be accused of racism, arrested for assault, not to mention getting beat up or stabbed. They voted to defund the police. It's their problem now.
People are missing that toxic masculinity, aren't they?
Overly sensitive soft men are weakening America. Yeah, I said it. Not sorry.
Play stupid game , win stupid price and this is the results of feminism .
Here is what is funny as hell. Calling masculine men Toxic and trying to get women to become Navy Seals! What a joke!

And that is how you make a white supremacist. 
Just punch them in the face for saying 'take a chill pill'.
That'll do it.
